channel.title: Official Rs Metanoia Advertisement
channel.description:
[tt][tt][/tt][/tt]website: http://Metanoiax.co.uk/ Forums : http://Metanoiax.co.uk/forums Client : http://download1501.mediafire.com/d0b0vtumn0yg/0ehci66dr2s77k1/MetanoiaX718.jar [img]http://i.imgur.com/5ik4J2N.jpg[/img]
RS Metanoia is a highly advanced, well-established Runescape Private Server with a huge amount of flawless content . Online 24/7, hosted on a dedicated server, RS Metanoia often has over 100 players online. It will blow your mind with its amazing skilling, economy and PKing with over 20 minigames and bosses to defeat! It is a 748 revision server, which means it's probably a more recent and modern server than another RSPS you may have played. Players are rewarded daily for voting, and there are many donator benefits!
Uniqe Features
-Lottery System Lottery system you can participate on the lottery by opening the lottery ticket, you can get lottery ticket by Pvming will automaticaly put the ticket in your inventory. ticket is 100k when the system detects that there are 20 ticket is opened it will automaticaly randomly choose to all who participate.
-Pvm Points Pvm Points System ; every npc/monster or boss kill you will get 2 pvm points you can use that PVM points to buy cool stuff @ pvm shop/ commander montai @ home
*working on TriviaBot now (points system)
Features
All features listed are working, 100% playable and live at the time of writing unless marked with a (*) in which case the marked features are partly working and still being actively developed, but are live and available for testing. Please note that some features are listed twice due to difficulty with categorization. We also have a lot of potential updates being tested that are not listed here.
General -Prestige System - Starter Packs - Loyalty Points (Auras) - Fist of Guthix Tokens (Pking Rewards) - Crystal Chest (Treasure Trail Items,Animal Masks,Mobilising Armies Robes) - Squeal of Fortune - Vote For Spins - Highscores - Friends List - Private Chat - Commands - Hairdresser - Makeovers - Skill Capes - Special Attacks - Donator Zone - Max Cape - Completionist Cape
Dungeons - Kuradal’s Dungeon - Jadinko Lair* - Polypore Dungeon - Cave Horror Dungeon - Glacor's Dungeon - Ice Strykwyrms dungeon
Bosses - Bandos Godwars - Zamorak Godwars - Armadyl Godwars - Saradomin Godwars - King Black Dragon - Queen Black Dragon - Corporeal Beast - Tormented Demons - Nex - Barrows
Wanting to know more before you start? Then look no further! Just scroll down!
A fully featured well designed home to match your every need.
Our custom made home provides you with all the shops you'll ever need to start your adventure, and pave your way to greatness. You'll also find quick access to many other features of the server including a portal to your POH.
10+ Npcs with over 30 shops Quick access to your POH Prayer and Summoning Altars Fishing and other Skilling Areas All of your favorite minigames to play!
We have all of your favorite minigames that are easy to access and well rewarding. Some of these include (but are definitely not limited to):
- Wilderness (PKing) - Clan Wars ( White/Red/Purple portal) - Fight Caves (Fire Cape) - Barrows - Fight Kiln (Tokhaar-Kal) - Castle Wars - Dominion Tower
Sell your hard earned items for the price you want
Our Player-Owned-Shops give you the ability to sell what you want at your own price, isntead of selling it to the store for a fixed amount. Anyone can use them at any time. They can be accessed by other players when they right-click you.
Add your items and edit your price Change price at any time Lock your store so you dont get screwed Check original value to ensure you aren't being scammed
-Optimus Coder/Owner Metanoia
[img]http://i.imgur.com/estdAtA.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/TRzmkUJ.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/vKXhP0H.jpg[/img]

item.title: Official Rs Metanoia Advertisement
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“eclipse rsps, post:4, topic:546960”][quote author=Ashi link=topic=665858.msg4451450#msg4451450 date=1411742969]

Can you make the logo a bit larger? I can’t seem to see it well.

It would be better to make it smaller so it would fit on your tiny screen!
[/quote]
Ya sorry we dont have 65 Inch monitors[/quote]
Go big or go home

Read full topic

item.title: Official Rs Metanoia Advertisement
item.dc:creator: @kbpapango kbpapango
item.description:
@kbpapango wrote:

[tt][tt][/tt][/tt]website: http://Metanoiax.co.uk/
Forums : http://Metanoiax.co.uk/forums
Client : http://download1501.mediafire.com/d0b0vtumn0yg/0ehci66dr2s77k1/MetanoiaX718.jar

RS Metanoia is a highly advanced, well-established Runescape Private Server with a huge amount of flawless content . Online 24/7, hosted on a dedicated server, RS Metanoia often has over 100 players online. It will blow your mind with its amazing skilling, economy and PKing with over 20 minigames and bosses to defeat! It is a 748 revision server, which means it’s probably a more recent and modern server than another RSPS you may have played. Players are rewarded daily for voting, and there are many donator benefits!

Uniqe Features

-Lottery System
Lottery system you can participate on the lottery by opening the lottery ticket, you can get lottery ticket by Pvming will automaticaly put the ticket in your inventory. ticket is 100k when the system detects that there are 20 ticket is opened it will automaticaly randomly choose to all who participate.

-Pvm Points
Pvm Points System ; every npc/monster or boss kill you will get 2 pvm points
you can use that PVM points to buy cool stuff @ pvm shop/ commander montai @ home

*working on TriviaBot now (points system)

Features

All features listed are working, 100% playable and live at the time of writing unless marked with a (*) in which case the marked features are partly working and still being actively developed, but are live and available for testing. Please note that some features are listed twice due to difficulty with categorization. We also have a lot of potential updates being tested that are not listed here.

General
-Prestige System

  • Starter Packs
  • Loyalty Points (Auras)
  • Fist of Guthix Tokens (Pking Rewards)
  • Crystal Chest (Treasure Trail Items,Animal Masks,Mobilising Armies Robes)
  • Squeal of Fortune
  • Vote For Spins
  • Highscores
  • Friends List
  • Private Chat
  • Commands
  • Hairdresser
  • Makeovers
  • Skill Capes
  • Special Attacks
  • Donator Zone
  • Max Cape
  • Completionist Cape

Dungeons

  • Kuradal’s Dungeon
  • Jadinko Lair*
  • Polypore Dungeon
  • Cave Horror Dungeon
  • Glacor’s Dungeon
  • Ice Strykwyrms dungeon

Bosses

  • Bandos Godwars
  • Zamorak Godwars
  • Armadyl Godwars
  • Saradomin Godwars
  • King Black Dragon
  • Queen Black Dragon
  • Corporeal Beast
  • Tormented Demons
  • Nex
  • Barrows

Wanting to know more before you start?
Then look no further! Just scroll down!

A fully featured well designed home to match your every need.

Our custom made home provides you with all the shops you’ll ever need to start your adventure, and pave your way to greatness. You’ll also find quick access to many other features of the server including a portal to your POH.

10+ Npcs with over 30 shops
Quick access to your POH
Prayer and Summoning Altars
Fishing and other Skilling Areas
All of your favorite minigames to play!

We have all of your favorite minigames that are easy to access and well rewarding. Some of these include (but are definitely not limited to):

  • Wilderness (PKing)
  • Clan Wars ( White/Red/Purple portal)
  • Fight Caves (Fire Cape)
  • Barrows
  • Fight Kiln (Tokhaar-Kal)
  • Castle Wars
  • Dominion Tower

Sell your hard earned items for the price you want

Our Player-Owned-Shops give you the ability to sell what you want at your own price, isntead of selling it to the store for a fixed amount. Anyone can use them at any time. They can be accessed by other players when they right-click you.

Add your items and edit your price
Change price at any time
Lock your store so you dont get screwed
Check original value to ensure you aren’t being scammed

-Optimus
Coder/Owner Metanoia

Read full topic
